item.description:
MMET AT PUALS HOUSE NOT IHOP CALL ME FOR DIRECTIONS DOUG

Who says you have to go to New Hampshire for a foliage ride ? We will chase the foliage south to Rhode Island.

Meet at the Brighton IHOP for breakfast then take a ride to Rhode Island, where in Rhode Island ? Heck we will decide this over pancakes and oatmeal at IHOP!

Who knows if Ray is not taking a weekend exam we might run into him... maybe go to a Rhode Island Motorcycle or Scooter Store... or see where we might live when we win the lottery (mansions). If you want to find out where we are going you will at least have to join us for breakfast... :-)

For 250cc scoots and above

Doug
item.name: Southern New England Foliage Ride MEET AT PAULS HOUSE NOT IHOP
